title: Ajith Has Done A Never Tried Before Role: Director Siva Opens Up About Vedalam
text:
Posted by: Avinash Gopinath Updated: Wednesday, October 21, 2015, 17:45 [IST] 
While the news about Thala Ajith undergoing yet another surgery on his right leg (reportedly, the injury happened during the last day shoot of Vedalam ) doesn't have any official backing, the piece of information you are about to read does have its elucidation from Siva and AM Rathnam. 
Director Siva who initially helmed Veeram with Ajith in the lead has opened up for the first time about his upcoming flick Vedalam , which is fast turning out to be one of the most expected Tamil movies of the year. 
"Vedalam is definitely not aimed only at Ajith fans. All movie buffs and general audience will enjoy the film, that's how I've directed it", said the Siruthai director. 
He also went on to add a peculiar information about the film, he said, "Ajith sir has done a never tried before role in his entire career. You will know what I am talking about when you witness the movie". 
His statement has once again stirred the curiosity among fans with some speculating that Vedalam might indeed be a horror flick. 
AM Rathnam, the film's producer exhibited confidence while speaking, he said, "I have no doubts that Vedalam will go on to become an important film in Ajith sir's career".
